frameworks.name: DASS-21
frameworks.description: Depression Anxiety Stress Scales - measures negative emotional states
frameworks.use_case: Initial assessment of depression, anxiety and stress levels
example_questions: I found it hard to wind down
I was aware of dryness of my mouth
I couldn't seem to experience any positive feeling at all

frameworks.name: PHQ-9
frameworks.description: Patient Health Questionnaire - screens for depression
example_questions: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much

frameworks.name: GAD-7
frameworks.description: Generalized Anxiety Disorder scale - screens for anxiety
example_questions: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
Not being able to stop or control worrying
Worrying too much about different things

self_reflection_prompts: When did you first notice these feelings?
What situations seem to make you feel better or worse?
Have you noticed any patterns in your thoughts when you feel this way?
How has this been affecting your daily life and relationships?
